asignments.name: Five Homework Photos
asignments.description: Over our semester, we were required to take five photos every two weeks to teach us about the basics of photography. Here are some of the photos I took.

asignments.name: Rose Birthday Card
asignments.description: This was a first project to get used to the basics of photshop.

asignments.name: Pineapple Hawaii Postcard
asignments.description: This asignment taught us about using layers within photoshop

asignments.name: The Family On the Bridge
asignments.description: I learned how to correct photos with the healing tools.
